post.summary: Activate the user's account
Request activation link
Give user admin rights.

delete.summary: Delete comment. Only the comment author can delete it.

put.summary: Update comment. Only the comment author can update it.

delete.summary: Remove reaction from comment. Activated account required.

put.summary: Put reaction to comment. Activated account required.

post.summary: Create a new reply to a comment. Activated account required.
Report comment. Activated account required.

get.summary: Get the default AI prompt. Only for admins.

put.summary: Update default AI prompt. Only for admins.

get.summary: Get AI data suggestions for the city. Only for admins.

post.summary: Send AI data suggestion for city to admins. Activated account required.

delete.summary: Delete AI data suggestion. Only for admins.

get.summary: Get specific AI data suggestion. Only for admins.
Get AI prompt for city. Only for admins.

put.summary: Update AI prompt for city. Only for admins.

post.summary: Login user. Set refresh token cookie.
Log out from the current device. Unset refresh token cookie.

400.description: Invalid secret code or new password

post.summary: Reset password using a secret code from email and pass a new password
Request email with a secret code for password reset
Create a new post. Activated account required.

delete.summary: Delete a post by ID. Only the author can delete the post.

patch.summary: Edit a post by ID using JSON Patch. Only the author can edit the post.

put.summary: Update a post by ID. Only the author can update the post.
Request generation of AI comment for post. Activated account required.

post.summary: Create a new comment for the post. Activated account required.

delete.summary: Remove reaction from the post. Activated account required.

put.summary: Add or update reaction to the post. Activated account required.

post.summary: Report post. Activated account required.
Create a new solution for post. Activated account required.
Refresh access token
Register a new user. Set refresh token cookie. Send the activation link.

put.summary: Approve the report. Delete the corresponding post / comment / solution.
Disapprove report. Undelete the corresponding post / comment / solution.

delete.summary: Delete the solution. Only the author of the solution can delete it.

patch.summary: Partially update solution using JSON Patch. Only the author of the solution can edit it.

put.summary: Update solution. Only the author of the solution can update it

delete.summary: Remove approval of the solution. Only the author of the post can remove approval.

put.summary: Approve the solution. Only the author of the post can approve the solution.

post.summary: Create a new comment for the solution. Activated account required.

delete.summary: Remove reaction from the solution. Activated account required.

put.summary: Add or update reaction to the solution. Activated account required.

post.summary: Report solution. Activated account required.
Upload image. Activated account required.

patch.summary: Edit the current user profile using JSON Patch.

get.summary: Get user's bans. Only for admins and the user themselves.

post.summary: Create a user's ban. Only for admins.

get.summary: Get the specific user's ban. Only for admins and the user themselves.

patch.summary: Partially update the user's ban. Only for admins.
